comments.body: Quote from: eoakland on September 04, 2024, 11:11:35 PM@minerjones - how much per pack? are you selling the jordan one individually? ThanksCurrently Scarce City has 3 packs available for $500 each: https://scarce.city/creators/pepe-flyersThey were much cheaper when released and the base price per pack has been climbing steadily sinceI do not have a Jordan card, but I do have others for sale.Check a few posts up from this one to see the pricing and which cards are available
